core.name: Deep Strike
core.description: Some units make their way to battle via tunnelling, teleportation, high-altitude descent or other extraordinary means that allow them to appear suddenly in the thick of the fighting.During the Declare Battle Formations step, if every model in a unit has this ability, you can set it up in Reserves instead of setting it up on the battlefield. If you do, in the Reinforcements step of one of your Movement phases you can set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models. If a unit with the Deep Strike ability arrives from Strategic Reserves, the controlling player can choose for that unit to be set up either using the rules for Strategic Reserves or using the Deep Strike ability. Unit can be set up in Reserves instead of on the battlefield.Unit can be set up in your Reinforcements step, more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

faction.name: Martial Ka’tah
faction.description: Each time a unit from your army with this ability is selected to fight, select one of the Ka’tah Stances below. Until that unit has finished making its attacks, the selected Stance is active for it and it gains the relevant ability:Dacatarai StanceThose Custodians skilled in the Dacatarai Ka'tah are able to turn their enemies numerical advantage against them. Reserved for when the Custodians must battle seething hordes of foes, this stance sees them reap a terrible tallyMelee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.Rendax StanceMasters of Rendax are superlative monster and war machine hunters. They have studied every aspect of how to do battle with a foe far larger than themselves, how to evade its powerful attacks, exploit its blind spots and lay it low.Melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

datasheet.name: Stand Vigil
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

datasheet.name: Sentinel Storm
datasheet.description: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, it can shoot again.

wargear.name: Praesidium Shield
wargear.description: Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

wargear.name: Vexilla
wargear.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

core.name: Deadly Demise
core.description: From detonating ammo stores to corrosive innards or frenzied death throes, some targets are deadly even in defeat.Some models have ‘Deadly Demise x’ listed in their abilities. When such a model is destroyed, roll one D6 before removing it from play (if such a model is a TRANSPORT, roll before any embarked models disembark). On a 6, each unit within 6" of that model suffers a number of mortal wounds denoted by ‘x’ (if this is a random number, roll separately for each unit within 6").Example: A TRANSPORT model with the Deadly Demise D3 ability is destroyed. Before any models disembark and before removing it from play, its controlling player rolls one D6, getting a 6. There are three units within 6" of that destroyed model, so its controlling player rolls one D3 for each of them, inflicting mortal wounds accordingly.Deadly Demise x: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers ‘x’ mortal wounds.

core.description: Some units make their way to battle via tunnelling, teleportation, high-altitude descent or other extraordinary means that allow them to appear suddenly in the thick of the fighting.During the Declare Battle Formations step, if every model in a unit has this ability, you can set it up in Reserves instead of setting it up on the battlefield. core.name: Feel No Pain
core.description: Some warriors refuse to be laid low, even by what should be fatal wounds.Some models have ‘Feel No Pain x+’ listed in their abilities. Each time a model with this ability suffers damage and so would lose a wound (including wounds lost due to mortal wounds), roll one D6: if the result is greater than or equal to the number denoted by ‘x’, that wound is ignored and is not lost. If a model has more than one Feel No Pain ability, you can only use one of those abilities each time that model suffers damage and so would lose a wound.Feel No Pain x+: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: if the result equals or exceeds ‘x’, that wound is not lost.

core.name: Leader
core.description: Mighty heroes fight at the forefront of battle.Some CHARACTER units have ‘Leader’ listed on their datasheets. Such CHARACTER units are known as Leaders, and the units they can lead – known as their Bodyguard units – are listed on their datasheet.During the Declare Battle Formations step, for each Leader in your army, if your army also includes one or more of that Leader’s Bodyguard units, you can select one of those Bodyguard units. That Leader will then attach to that Bodyguard unit for the duration of the battle and is said to be leading that unit. Each Bodyguard unit can only have one Leader attached to it.While a Bodyguard unit contains a Leader, it is known as an Attached unit and, with the exception of rules that are triggered when units are destroyed, it is treated as a single unit for all rules purposes. Each time an attack targets an Attached unit, until the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks, you must use the Toughness characteristic of the Bodyguard models in that unit, even if a Leader in that unit has a different Toughness characteristic. Each time an attack sucessfully wounds an Attached unit, that attack cannot be allocated to a CHARACTER model in that unit, even if that CHARACTER model has lost one or more wounds or has already had attacks allocated to it this phase. As soon as the last Bodyguard model in an Attached unit has been destroyed, any attacks made against that unit that have yet to be allocated can then be allocated to CHARACTER models in that unit.Each time the last model in a Bodyguard unit is destroyed, each CHARACTER unit that is part of that Attached unit is no longer part of an Attached unit. It becomes a separate unit, with its original Starting Strength. If this happens as the result of an attack, they become separate units after the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks.Each time the last model in a CHARACTER unit that is attached to a Bodyguard unit is destroyed and there is not another CHARACTER unit attached, that Attached unit’s Bodyguard unit is no longer part of an Attached unit. It becomes a separate unit, with its original Starting Strength. If this happens as the result of an attack, they become separate units after the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks. Each time a unit that is part of an Attached unit is destroyed, it does not have the keywords of any other units that make up that Attached unit (unless it has those keywords on its own datasheet) for the purposes of any rules that would be triggered when that unit is destroyed.Example: If you only destroy the Bodyguard unit that is part of an Attached unit, you have not destroyed a CHARACTER unit. If you only destroy the CHARACTER unit that is part of an Attached unit, or if you destroy the whole Attached unit, you have destroyed one CHARACTER unit.Before the battle, CHARACTER units with the Leader ability can be attached to one of their Bodyguard units to form an Attached unit.Attached units can only contain one Leader.Attacks cannot be allocated to CHARACTER models in Attached units.

core.name: Deep Strike
core.description: Some units make their way to battle via tunnelling, teleportation, high-altitude descent or other extraordinary means that allow them to appear suddenly in the thick of the fighting.During the Declare Battle Formations step, if every model in a unit has this ability, you can set it up in Reserves instead of setting it up on the battlefield. If you do, in the Reinforcements step of one of your Movement phases you can set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models. If a unit with the Deep Strike ability arrives from Strategic Reserves, the controlling player can choose for that unit to be set up either using the rules for Strategic Reserves or using the Deep Strike ability. Unit can be set up in Reserves instead of on the battlefield.Unit can be set up in your Reinforcements step, more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

faction.name: Martial Ka’tah
faction.description: Each time a unit from your army with this ability is selected to fight, select one of the Ka’tah Stances below. Until that unit has finished making its attacks, the selected Stance is active for it and it gains the relevant ability:Dacatarai StanceThose Custodians skilled in the Dacatarai Ka'tah are able to turn their enemies numerical advantage against them. Reserved for when the Custodians must battle seething hordes of foes, this stance sees them reap a terrible tallyMelee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.Rendax StanceMasters of Rendax are superlative monster and war machine hunters. They have studied every aspect of how to do battle with a foe far larger than themselves, how to evade its powerful attacks, exploit its blind spots and lay it low.Melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

core.name: Deadly Demise
core.description: From detonating ammo stores to corrosive innards or frenzied death throes, some targets are deadly even in defeat.Some models have ‘Deadly Demise x’ listed in their abilities. When such a model is destroyed, roll one D6 before removing it from play (if such a model is a TRANSPORT, roll before any embarked models disembark). On a 6, each unit within 6" of that model suffers a number of mortal wounds denoted by ‘x’ (if this is a random number, roll separately for each unit within 6").Example: A TRANSPORT model with the Deadly Demise D3 ability is destroyed. Before any models disembark and before removing it from play, its controlling player rolls one D6, getting a 6. There are three units within 6" of that destroyed model, so its controlling player rolls one D3 for each of them, inflicting mortal wounds accordingly.Deadly Demise x: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers ‘x’ mortal wounds.

datasheet.name: Saturation Volleys
datasheet.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

core.name: Deadly Demise
core.description: From detonating ammo stores to corrosive innards or frenzied death throes, some targets are deadly even in defeat.Some models have ‘Deadly Demise x’ listed in their abilities. When such a model is destroyed, roll one D6 before removing it from play (if such a model is a TRANSPORT, roll before any embarked models disembark). On a 6, each unit within 6" of that model suffers a number of mortal wounds denoted by ‘x’ (if this is a random number, roll separately for each unit within 6").Example: A TRANSPORT model with the Deadly Demise D3 ability is destroyed. Before any models disembark and before removing it from play, its controlling player rolls one D6, getting a 6. There are three units within 6" of that destroyed model, so its controlling player rolls one D3 for each of them, inflicting mortal wounds accordingly.Deadly Demise x: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers ‘x’ mortal wounds.

core.name: Hover
core.description: Some aircraft can use vectored thrusters or anti-grav technology to hover over the battlefield, the better to hunt their prey or deploy embarked troops.Some AIRCRAFT models have ‘Hover’ listed in their abilities. When you are instructed to Declare Battle Formations, before doing anything else, you must first declare which models from your army with this ability will be in Hover mode.If a model is in Hover mode, then until the end of the battle, its Move characteristic is changed to 20", it loses the AIRCRAFT keyword and it loses all associated rules for being an AIRCRAFT model. Models in Hover mode do not start the battle in Reserves, but you can choose to place them into Strategic Reserves following the normal rules if you wish.

core.name: Feel No Pain
core.description: Some warriors refuse to be laid low, even by what should be fatal wounds.Some models have ‘Feel No Pain x+’ listed in their abilities. Each time a model with this ability suffers damage and so would lose a wound (including wounds lost due to mortal wounds), roll one D6: if the result is greater than or equal to the number denoted by ‘x’, that wound is ignored and is not lost. If a model has more than one Feel No Pain ability, you can only use one of those abilities each time that model suffers damage and so would lose a wound.Feel No Pain x+: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: if the result equals or exceeds ‘x’, that wound is not lost.

core.name: Leader
core.description: Mighty heroes fight at the forefront of battle.Some CHARACTER units have ‘Leader’ listed on their datasheets. Such CHARACTER units are known as Leaders, and the units they can lead – known as their Bodyguard units – are listed on their datasheet.During the Declare Battle Formations step, for each Leader in your army, if your army also includes one or more of that Leader’s Bodyguard units, you can select one of those Bodyguard units. That Leader will then attach to that Bodyguard unit for the duration of the battle and is said to be leading that unit. Each Bodyguard unit can only have one Leader attached to it.While a Bodyguard unit contains a Leader, it is known as an Attached unit and, with the exception of rules that are triggered when units are destroyed, it is treated as a single unit for all rules purposes. Each time an attack targets an Attached unit, until the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks, you must use the Toughness characteristic of the Bodyguard models in that unit, even if a Leader in that unit has a different Toughness characteristic. Each time an attack sucessfully wounds an Attached unit, that attack cannot be allocated to a CHARACTER model in that unit, even if that CHARACTER model has lost one or more wounds or has already had attacks allocated to it this phase. As soon as the last Bodyguard model in an Attached unit has been destroyed, any attacks made against that unit that have yet to be allocated can then be allocated to CHARACTER models in that unit.Each time the last model in a Bodyguard unit is destroyed, each CHARACTER unit that is part of that Attached unit is no longer part of an Attached unit. It becomes a separate unit, with its original Starting Strength. If this happens as the result of an attack, they become separate units after the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks.Each time the last model in a CHARACTER unit that is attached to a Bodyguard unit is destroyed and there is not another CHARACTER unit attached, that Attached unit’s Bodyguard unit is no longer part of an Attached unit. It becomes a separate unit, with its original Starting Strength. If this happens as the result of an attack, they become separate units after the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks. Each time a unit that is part of an Attached unit is destroyed, it does not have the keywords of any other units that make up that Attached unit (unless it has those keywords on its own datasheet) for the purposes of any rules that would be triggered when that unit is destroyed.Example: If you only destroy the Bodyguard unit that is part of an Attached unit, you have not destroyed a CHARACTER unit. If you only destroy the CHARACTER unit that is part of an Attached unit, or if you destroy the whole Attached unit, you have destroyed one CHARACTER unit.Before the battle, CHARACTER units with the Leader ability can be attached to one of their Bodyguard units to form an Attached unit.Attached units can only contain one Leader.Attacks cannot be allocated to CHARACTER models in Attached units.

core.name: Scouts
core.description: Scouts form the vanguard of many armies. Unnoticed by the enemy, they range ahead of the main force.Some units have ‘Scouts x"’ listed in their abilities. If every model in a unit has this ability, then at the start of the first battle round, before the first turn begins, it can make a Normal move of up to x", with the exception that, while making that move, the distance moved by each model in that unit can be greater than that model's Move characteristic, as long as it is not greater than x".DEDICATED TRANSPORT models can make use of any Scouts x" ability listed in their abilities, or a Scouts x" ability that a unit that starts the battle embarked within that DEDICATED TRANSPORT model has (provided only models with this ability are embarked within that DEDICATED TRANSPORT model), regardless of how that embarked unit gained this ability (e.g. listed in their abilities, conferred by an Enhancement or by an attached CHARACTER, etc.).A unit that moves using this ability must end that move more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models. If both players have units that can do this, the player who is taking the first turn moves their units first.Example: A unit has the Scouts 6" ability. At the start of the first battle round, the controlling player can make a Normal move with that unit of up to 6".Scouts x": Unit can make a Normal move of up to x" before the first turn begins.If embarked in a DEDICATED TRANSPORT, that DEDICATED TRANSPORT can make this move instead.Must end this move more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

core.name: Deep Strike
core.description: Some units make their way to battle via tunnelling, teleportation, high-altitude descent or other extraordinary means that allow them to appear suddenly in the thick of the fighting.During the Declare Battle Formations step, if every model in a unit has this ability, you can set it up in Reserves instead of setting it up on the battlefield. If you do, in the Reinforcements step of one of your Movement phases you can set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models. If a unit with the Deep Strike ability arrives from Strategic Reserves, the controlling player can choose for that unit to be set up either using the rules for Strategic Reserves or using the Deep Strike ability. Unit can be set up in Reserves instead of on the battlefield.Unit can be set up in your Reinforcements step, more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

core.name: Scouts
core.description: Scouts form the vanguard of many armies. Unnoticed by the enemy, they range ahead of the main force.Some units have ‘Scouts x"’ listed in their abilities. If every model in a unit has this ability, then at the start of the first battle round, before the first turn begins, it can make a Normal move of up to x", with the exception that, while making that move, the distance moved by each model in that unit can be greater than that model's Move characteristic, as long as it is not greater than x".DEDICATED TRANSPORT models can make use of any Scouts x" ability listed in their abilities, or a Scouts x" ability that a unit that starts the battle embarked within that DEDICATED TRANSPORT model has (provided only models with this ability are embarked within that DEDICATED TRANSPORT model), regardless of how that embarked unit gained this ability (e.g. listed in their abilities, conferred by an Enhancement or by an attached CHARACTER, etc.).A unit that moves using this ability must end that move more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models. If both players have units that can do this, the player who is taking the first turn moves their units first.Example: A unit has the Scouts 6" ability. At the start of the first battle round, the controlling player can make a Normal move with that unit of up to 6".Scouts x": Unit can make a Normal move of up to x" before the first turn begins.If embarked in a DEDICATED TRANSPORT, that DEDICATED TRANSPORT can make this move instead.Must end this move more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

core.name: Deadly Demise
core.description: From detonating ammo stores to corrosive innards or frenzied death throes, some targets are deadly even in defeat.Some models have ‘Deadly Demise x’ listed in their abilities. When such a model is destroyed, roll one D6 before removing it from play (if such a model is a TRANSPORT, roll before any embarked models disembark). On a 6, each unit within 6" of that model suffers a number of mortal wounds denoted by ‘x’ (if this is a random number, roll separately for each unit within 6").Example: A TRANSPORT model with the Deadly Demise D3 ability is destroyed. Before any models disembark and before removing it from play, its controlling player rolls one D6, getting a 6. There are three units within 6" of that destroyed model, so its controlling player rolls one D3 for each of them, inflicting mortal wounds accordingly.Deadly Demise x: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers ‘x’ mortal wounds.

core.name: Firing Deck
core.description: Some transports have firing hatches, ports or platforms from which embarked passengers can shoot.Some TRANSPORT models have ‘Firing Deck x’ listed in their abilities. Each time such a model is selected to shoot in the Shooting phase, you can select up to ‘x’ models embarked within it whose units have not already shot this phase. Then, for each of those embarked models, you can select one ranged weapon that embarked model is equipped with (excluding weapons with the [ONE SHOT] ability). Until that TRANSPORT model has resolved all of its attacks, it counts as being equipped with all of the weapons you selected in this way, in addition to its other weapons. Until the end of the phase, those selected models’ units are not eligible to shoot.Firing Deck ‘x’: Each time this TRANSPORT shoots, select one weapon (excluding weapons with the [ONE SHOT] ability) from up to ‘x’ models embarked within it whose units have not shot this phase; this TRANSPORT counts as being equipped with those weapons as well. Until the end of the phase, those selected models’ units are not eligible to shoot.

stratagems.name: VIGIL UNENDING
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Custodes do not yield while their duty remains unfulfilled.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed and has not fought this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.EFFECT: Do not remove your destroyed model from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed and has not fought this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Do not remove your destroyed model from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: EARNING OF A NAME
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: To lay low the greatest and most terrible monsters and heretics is to earn new names for a Custodian's mighty tally.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER units from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a CHARACTER model in either of your units makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: In an age plagued by monsters, when primordial horrors from the darkest void circle Humanity's dying light, still the Adeptus Custodes stand strong.

stratagems.name: SUPERHUMAN RESERVES
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: With practiced ease, the Talons of the Emperor establish vicious crossfires to cut the foe apart.

stratagems.name: SLAYER OF CHAMPIONS
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Whatfoe can withstand a warrior who has so tested the defences of the Throneworld itself?
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that has just destroyed the unit you selected at the start of your Command phase as the target of your Assemblage of Might ability.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit on the battlefield Until the start of your next Command phase, each time an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army makes an attack that target that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll In addition, if the destroyed unit was a CHARACTER unit, gain 1CP.

stratagems.name: SHOULDER THE MANTLE
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The greatest Custodians know when it is both their duty and their right to command their comrades.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, before the Reinforcements step.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that is not leading a unit.EFFECT: Select one friendly unit (excluding Battle-shocked and Attached units) within 2" horizontally and 5" vertically of your model that it could lead (as described in the Leader section of its datasheet). Your model attaches to that unit as a Leader. Change that unit’s Starting Strength accordingly.

In addition, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by an additional 1.

stratagems.name: DESPERATION’S PRICE
stratagems.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: To overcome the Null Maidens’ aura, enemy psykers overstretch themselves with horrible consequences.

stratagems.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Enemies must overcome disorienting waves of revulsion in order to even focus upon Null Maidens.

stratagems.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Prosecutors can fire psy-chaff bolts whose esoteric emissions weaken those targets not slain outright.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has just shot.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while your unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is prosecuted. While a unit is prosecuted, each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA model makes an attack against that unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. While a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit is prosecuted, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: VIGILANCE ETERNAL
stratagems.type: Shield Host – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Simply because the Adeptus Custodes do not stand sentinel over a strategic location or asset, does not mean that it - or any who would threaten it - escapes their gaze.

stratagems.name: FLAWLESS CONSTRUCTION
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The vehicles of the Adeptus Custodes are the finest examples of their kind. Their expertly wrought armoured forms contain ancient and esoteric technology, including auto-repair subroutines and reactive field generators.

stratagems.name: EMPEROR’S VENGEANCE
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Even as death’s cold embrace falls upon them, Custodians vent the last of their wrath upon the foe.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the WALKER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the WALKER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: WRATHFUL ADVANCE
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The golden-armoured onslaught smashes through the enemy line, trapping the foe and preventing their escape.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Piles In.TARGET: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3".
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Piles In.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3".

stratagems.name: PUNISHMENT INESCAPABLE
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Ten Thousand are relentless in pursuing the Emperor’s foes and thorough in their annihilation. No armour, sorcery or hiding place can shield an enemy from their wrath.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: RELENTLESS PERSECUTION
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Custodians coax wrathful fury from their war engines’ machine spirits to hunt down and eliminate their foes at speed.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army Advances.TARGET: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the WALKER keyword, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced instead.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army Advances.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the WALKER keyword, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced instead.

stratagems.name: UNSTOPPABLE
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Armoured in adamantine and possessed of furious machine spirits, the vehicles of the Adeptus Custodes are almost impossible to stop in their tracks.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your Movement phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE or ADEPTUS CUSTODES MOUNTED unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can move horizontally through models and terrain features.
stratagems.when: Start of your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE or ADEPTUS CUSTODES MOUNTED unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

stratagems.name: EMPEROR’S EXECUTIONERS
stratagems.type: Talons Of The Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Talons of the Emperor tear apart their prey.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of the Fight phase.TARGET: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll.RESTRICTIONS: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.
stratagems.when: Start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll.RESTRICTIONS: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.name: TALONS INTERLOCKED
stratagems.type: Talons Of The Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: With practiced ease, the Talons of the Emperor establish vicious crossfires to cut the foe apart.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY units from your army, and one enemy unit that is an eligible target for all of those units.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your units can only target that enemy unit, but each time a model in one of your units makes a ranged attack, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.RESTRICTIONS: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY units from your army, and one enemy unit that is an eligible target for all of those units.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your units can only target that enemy unit, but each time a model in one of your units makes a ranged attack, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.RESTRICTIONS: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.name: EMPYRIC SEVERANCE
stratagems.type: Talons Of The Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Null Maidens quash the manifestations of witches.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one friendly ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit within 6" of that ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic attacks and mortal wounds.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one friendly ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit within 6" of that ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic attacks and mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: TALONED PINCER
stratagems.type: Talons Of The Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Every move the enemy makes only sees them fall.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit.EFFECT: Your units can make a Normal move of up to 6".RESTRICTIONS: You cannot select units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Your units can make a Normal move of up to 6".RESTRICTIONS: You cannot select units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.name: SHIELD OF HONOUR
stratagems.type: Talons Of The Emperor – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: It is second nature for Custodes to place themselves between their comrades and potential peril.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one other friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY unit (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within 6" of that ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, any attack that targets your ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit must instead target your other ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit (unless it is not an eligible target).

stratagems.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one other friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY unit (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within 6" of that ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, any attack that targets your ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit must instead target your other ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit (unless it is not an eligible target).

stratagems.name: HUNT AS ONE
stratagems.type: Talons Of The Emperor – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Custodians and Null Maidens cover one another seamlessly as they manoeuvre to corner their prey.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your Movement phase.TARGET: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your units are eilgible to shoot and/or declare a charge in a turn in which they Fell Back.RESTRICTIONS: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your units are eilgible to shoot and/or declare a charge in a turn in which they Fell Back.RESTRICTIONS: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.name: ARTIFICER ROUNDS
stratagems.type: Voyagers in Darkness – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: These hand-crafted bolt shells are made to fragment with particular ferocity, making them ideal for boarding actions.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding ballistus grenade launchers) have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability while targeting units within 6".
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding ballistus grenade launchers) have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability while targeting units within 6".

stratagems.name: AURIC STORM
stratagems.type: Voyagers in Darkness – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Even the boldest foes falter before the sudden and unstoppable onslaught of the Allarus Terminators.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase, just after an ALLARUS CUSTODIANS unit from your army ends a Charge move.TARGET: That ALLARUS CUSTODIANS unit.EFFECT: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase, just after an ALLARUS CUSTODIANS unit from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.target: That ALLARUS CUSTODIANS unit.
stratagems.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

stratagems.name: BREACHING BEHEMOTHS
stratagems.type: Voyagers in Darkness – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: When unleashed aboard an enemy voidship, Custodians simply smash a path through any who stand against them by their sheer armoured might.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in your unit can move through other models as if they were not there. In addition, any Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in your unit can move through other models as if they were not there. In addition, any Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed.

stratagems.name: INESCAPABLE VENGEANCE
stratagems.type: Voyagers in Darkness – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The incredible sensory acuity of the Custodians' wargear coupled with their superhuman senses means no foe can hide from them.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can ignore Walls and other models for the purposes of determining which enemy units are visible to its own.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can ignore Walls and other models for the purposes of determining which enemy units are visible to its own.

stratagems.name: VIGIL UNENDING
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Custodes do not yield while their duty remains unfulfilled.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed and has not fought this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.EFFECT: Do not remove your destroyed model from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed and has not fought this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Do not remove your destroyed model from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: EARNING OF A NAME
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: To lay low the greatest and most terrible monsters and heretics is to earn new names for a Custodian's mighty tally.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER units from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a CHARACTER model in either of your units makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER units from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a CHARACTER model in either of your units makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: THE EMPEROR’S AUSPICE
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: In an age plagued by monsters, when primordial horrors from the darkest void circle Humanity's dying light, still the Adeptus Custodes stand strong.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, CHARACTER models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, CHARACTER models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

stratagems.name: SUPERHUMAN RESERVES
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: With practiced ease, the Talons of the Emperor establish vicious crossfires to cut the foe apart.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES WARLORD model from your army has used an ability on its datasheet or from an Enhancement that says it can only be used Once per battle.TARGET: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES WARLORD model.EFFECT: Your model can use its Once per battle’ ability one additional time during this battle (but not in the same phase).RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per battle.
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES WARLORD model from your army has used an ability on its datasheet or from an Enhancement that says it can only be used Once per battle.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES WARLORD model.
stratagems.effect: Your model can use its Once per battle’ ability one additional time during this battle (but not in the same phase).RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per battle.

stratagems.name: SLAYER OF CHAMPIONS
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Whatfoe can withstand a warrior who has so tested the defences of the Throneworld itself?
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that has just destroyed the unit you selected at the start of your Command phase as the target of your Assemblage of Might ability.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit on the battlefield Until the start of your next Command phase, each time an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army makes an attack that target that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll In addition, if the destroyed unit was a CHARACTER unit, gain 1CP.
stratagems.when: Any phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that has just destroyed the unit you selected at the start of your Command phase as the target of your Assemblage of Might ability.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit on the battlefield Until the start of your next Command phase, each time an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army makes an attack that target that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll In addition, if the destroyed unit was a CHARACTER unit, gain 1CP.

stratagems.name: SHOULDER THE MANTLE
stratagems.type: Auric Champions – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The greatest Custodians know when it is both their duty and their right to command their comrades.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, before the Reinforcements step.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that is not leading a unit.EFFECT: Select one friendly unit (excluding Battle-shocked and Attached units) within 2" horizontally and 5" vertically of your model that it could lead (as described in the Leader section of its datasheet). Your model attaches to that unit as a Leader. Change that unit’s Starting Strength accordingly.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, before the Reinforcements step.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that is not leading a unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one friendly unit (excluding Battle-shocked and Attached units) within 2" horizontally and 5" vertically of your model that it could lead (as described in the Leader section of its datasheet). Your model attaches to that unit as a Leader. Change that unit’s Starting Strength accordingly.

abilities.name: Assemblage of Might
abilities.legend: When such exceptional warriors as these gather to quest in the Emperors name, even the most dreadful foes of Humanity are right to fear for their lives.
abilities.rawDescription: At the start of your Command phase, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.
abilities.formattedDescription: At the start of your Command phase, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: PUNISHMENT OF THE PROSECUTORS
stratagems.type: Black Ship Guardians – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Prosecutors cut down without mercy all who dare stand between the Silent Sisters and their prey.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by an additional 1.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by an additional 1.

stratagems.name: FOCUSED FEAR
stratagems.type: Black Ship Guardians – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Fighting in the confines of a voidship heightens the fearful aura of the Sisters of Silence, fouling their foes'aim and weakening their sword arms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: BLADES OF THE VIGILATORS
stratagems.type: Black Ship Guardians – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Though intended for lopping the heads from witches, the Vigilators' long blades also allow for skilful parrying of incoming attacks.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One VIGILATORS, ALEYA or KNIGHT-CENTURA equipped with an executioner greatblade unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One VIGILATORS, ALEYA or KNIGHT-CENTURA equipped with an executioner greatblade unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: CORNERED PREY
stratagems.type: Black Ship Guardians – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Once they have their quarry trapped within a section of the voidship, the Silent Sisters relentlessly run them to ground.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army Falls Back.TARGET: That ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.target: That ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Priority Quarry
abilities.legend: With merciless efficiency, the Sisters of Silence mark their priority prey amidst the maelstrom of shiphoard combat, then focus on their elimination above all else.
abilities.rawDescription: At the start of the first battle round, you can select up to two enemy units to be your army’s quarry, one of which must be your opponents WARLORD. Each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army makes an attack that targets one of your army’s quarries, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. Each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army declares a charge, it can include one or more of your army’s quarries as targets of that charge, even if they are not visible to it.
abilities.formattedDescription: At the start of the first battle round, you can select up to two enemy units to be your army’s quarry, one of which must be your opponents WARLORD. Each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army makes an attack that targets one of your army’s quarries, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. Each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army declares a charge, it can include one or more of your army’s quarries as targets of that charge, even if they are not visible to it.

stratagems.name: PURGATION SWEEP
stratagems.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Witchseekers know their role in combat is to spread indiscriminate carnage through the foe’s ranks.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One WITCHSEEKERS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit. If such a weapon targets a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit this phase, add 2 to its Attacks characteristic instead.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One WITCHSEEKERS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit. If such a weapon targets a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit this phase, add 2 to its Attacks characteristic instead.

stratagems.name: WITCH HUNTERS
stratagems.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Null Maidens train to slay psykers with swift martial efficiency, for they know their prey have many weapons beyond just their powers and must not be allowed time or opportunity to employ them.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability, but models in your unit can only target PSYKER units with their attacks.

stratagems.name: ANATHEMA BLADEMASTERY
stratagems.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Vigilators train tirelessly in the art of the swift, beheading strike, with a particular emphasis on the swift elimination of enemy witches.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One VIGILATORS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll If the target of that attack is Battle-shocked or a PSYKER, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: DESPERATION’S PRICE
stratagems.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: To overcome the Null Maidens’ aura, enemy psykers overstretch themselves with horrible consequences.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, just after an enemy PSYKER unit has either finished using a Psychic ability that targets a unit, or finished making Psychic Attacks.TARGET: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army within 18" of that enemy PSYKER unit.EFFECT: That enemy PSYKER unit must take a Leadership test If the test is passed, that PSYKER unit is Battle-shocked; if the test is failed that PSYKER unit suffers 3 mortal wounds and is Battle-shocked.

stratagems.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army within 18" of that enemy PSYKER unit.
stratagems.effect: That enemy PSYKER unit must take a Leadership test If the test is passed, that PSYKER unit is Battle-shocked; if the test is failed that PSYKER unit suffers 3 mortal wounds and is Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: PSYCHIC ABOMINATIONS
stratagems.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Enemies must overcome disorienting waves of revulsion in order to even focus upon Null Maidens.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability, and Battle-shocked and PSYKER models can only select your unit as a target of a ranged attack if they are within 12".

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability, and Battle-shocked and PSYKER models can only select your unit as a target of a ranged attack if they are within 12".

stratagems.name: PSY-CHAFF VOLLEY
stratagems.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Prosecutors can fire psy-chaff bolts whose esoteric emissions weaken those targets not slain outright.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has just shot.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while your unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is prosecuted. While a unit is prosecuted, each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA model makes an attack against that unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. While a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit is prosecuted, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.target: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has just shot.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while your unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is prosecuted. While a unit is prosecuted, each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA model makes an attack against that unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. While a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit is prosecuted, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Creeping Dread (Aura)
abilities.legend: The instinctive fear caused by the Pariah gene spreads like a terrible pall before the cadres of the Silent Sisterhood.
abilities.rawDescription: In the Battle-shock step of your opponent’s Command phase, if an enemy unit that is either a PSYKER unit or below its Starting Strength is within 12" of one or more ANATHEMA PSYKANA models from your army, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that unit is Below Half-strength, it must subtract 1 from its Battle-shock test this phase instead.Designer’s Note: This means that all enemy PSYKER units within range of this Aura ability and all enemy units within range of this Aura ability that have lost one or more models must take a Battle-shock test in your opponents Command phase, not just those that are Below Half-strength.

If that unit is Below Half-strength, it must subtract 1 from its Battle-shock test this phase instead.Designer’s Note: This means that all enemy PSYKER units within range of this Aura ability and all enemy units within range of this Aura ability that have lost one or more models must take a Battle-shock test in your opponents Command phase, not just those that are Below Half-strength.

abilities.name: KEYWORDS
abilities.rawDescription: If you select this Detachment, PROSECUTORS units from your army have the BATTLELINE keyword.
abilities.formattedDescription: If you select this Detachment, PROSECUTORS units from your army have the BATTLELINE keyword.

stratagems.name: ARCHEOTECH MUNITIONS
stratagems.type: Shield Host  – Wargear Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Shield Hosts have access to stockpiles of ancient and incredibly rare weaponry and ammunition.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. stratagems.name: ARCANE GENETIC ALCHEMY
stratagems.type: Shield Host – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Adeptus Custodes are individually engineered on a molecular level using secrets of genetic alchemy that render them virtual demigods in battle.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, just after a mortal wound has been allocated to an ADEPTUS CUSTODES model from your army(excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA models).TARGET: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES model’s unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES model’s unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: AVENGE THE FALLEN
stratagems.type: Shield Host – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The loss of a single Talon of the Emperor is commemorated by the tolling of the Bell of Lost Souls on Terra, and by their comrades’ bloody vengeance on the battlefield.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of the Fight phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that is below its Starting Strength.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit. If your unit is Below Half-strength, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those melee weapons instead.

stratagems.name: MULTIPOTENTIALITY
stratagems.type: Shield Host – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: So widely skilled and studied are the Custodians that, whatever situation they find themselves in, they have the martial wisdom to prevail.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that Fell Back this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of your turn, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that Fell Back this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of your turn, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: UNWAVERING SENTINELS
stratagems.type: Shield Host – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Once the Custodians have laid claim to a location, they defend it with incredible tenacity and skill.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that is within range of an objective marker you control and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: VIGILANCE ETERNAL
stratagems.type: Shield Host – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Simply because the Adeptus Custodes do not stand sentinel over a strategic location or asset, does not mean that it - or any who would threaten it - escapes their gaze.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES BATTLELINE unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within range of an objective marker you control.EFFECT: That objective marker remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.effect: That objective marker remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

abilities.name: Martial Mastery
abilities.legend: The Custodians have perfected countless ways of making war, be it on a personal, tactical or strategic scale.
abilities.rawDescription: At the start of the battle round, you can select one of the bullet points below. If you do, until the start of the next battle round, that bullet point’s effects apply.Each time an ADEPTUS CUSTODES model from your army with the Martial Ka’tah ability makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.Improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by ADEPTUS CUSTODES models from your army with the Martial Ka’tah ability by 1.
abilities.formattedDescription: At the start of the battle round, you can select one of the bullet points below. stratagems.name: FLAWLESS CONSTRUCTION
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The vehicles of the Adeptus Custodes are the finest examples of their kind. Their expertly wrought armoured forms contain ancient and esoteric technology, including auto-repair subroutines and reactive field generators.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets a model in your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets a model in your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: EMPEROR’S VENGEANCE
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Even as death’s cold embrace falls upon them, Custodians vent the last of their wrath upon the foe.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the WALKER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

On a 4+, do not remove it from play; The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: WRATHFUL ADVANCE
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The golden-armoured onslaught smashes through the enemy line, trapping the foe and preventing their escape.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Piles In.TARGET: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3".
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Piles In.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3".

stratagems.name: PUNISHMENT INESCAPABLE
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Ten Thousand are relentless in pursuing the Emperor’s foes and thorough in their annihilation. No armour, sorcery or hiding place can shield an enemy from their wrath.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.

stratagems.name: RELENTLESS PERSECUTION
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Custodians coax wrathful fury from their war engines’ machine spirits to hunt down and eliminate their foes at speed.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army Advances.TARGET: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the WALKER keyword, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced instead.

stratagems.name: UNSTOPPABLE
stratagems.type: Solar Spearhead – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Armoured in adamantine and possessed of furious machine spirits, the vehicles of the Adeptus Custodes are almost impossible to stop in their tracks.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your Movement phase.TARGET: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE or ADEPTUS CUSTODES MOUNTED unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

abilities.name: Auric Armour
abilities.legend: The venerable war engines of the Adeptus Custodes possess aggressive machine spirits.

stratagems.name: EMPEROR’S EXECUTIONERS
stratagems.type: Talons Of The Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Talons of the Emperor tear apart their prey.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of the Fight phase.TARGET: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll.RESTRICTIONS: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.type: Talons Of The Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: With practiced ease, the Talons of the Emperor establish vicious crossfires to cut the foe apart.

stratagems.name: EMPYRIC SEVERANCE

stratagems.legend: Null Maidens quash the manifestations of witches.

stratagems.name: TALONED PINCER
stratagems.type: Talons Of The Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Every move the enemy makes only sees them fall.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit.EFFECT: Your units can make a Normal move of up to 6".RESTRICTIONS: You cannot select units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.
